function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited containment measures in communal spaces","Impact":"Higher probability of exposure to contagious diseases in communal areas","Mitigation":"Implement strict containment measures in communal areas to reduce exposure risk","Technologies":"Airlocks, rapid air exchange systems, separate air cycles","People":"Residents, hotel guests, visitors","Owner":"Building management, hotel management"},{"Description":"Inadequate pressure differentials and air circulation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to ineffective air flow","Mitigation":"Improve pressure differentials and air circulation to create positive flow from private to communal spaces","Technologies":"Pressure differentials, extraction systems for positive air flow","People":"Residents, hotel guests, visitors","Owner":"Building management, hotel management"},{"Description":"Inefficient containment space design","Impact":"Risk of contaminated air leaking from containment space to communal areas","Mitigation":"Design and construct effective containment spaces with sealed doors and rapid air exchange","Technologies":"Airlock systems, sealed doors, rapid air exchange systems","People":"Residents, hotel guests, visitors","Owner":"Building management, hotel management"}]}
